title: Riot, fix your trash game and client please (pics attached)
body:
So Its been days that ive been getting Dcd regularly and client crashing suddenly, so i lose the games and Lp and get punished to low priority queue while that has nothing to do with me.

Client bugs out before loading screen and ''reconnect''  button disappears, the funny thing is this has been going for 2 patches now and i wonder if riot employees sleep at their jobs or what are they doing ?

I don't even want to get started on getting autofilled WHILE ''autofill protected'' that's a topic for another day, but i'm tired of getting punished for Riots mistakes. 

Tell the ''Bug fixing office'' that ice cream break shouldn't last 6 months and that they should hop out of TFT and get into doing their jobs because it's unbearable playing this trash. 

pic :  https://gyazo.com/b812948830b28f1575d7c3d4bb2205ad 

pic 2 : https://gyazo.com/0bf56624e517af6fee38b54f2ad59c3e

btw i forgot to take more bugSplat and other client bugs pics from current patch

replies.body: I have the same problem .i go in game select and i never go to loading screen  and i am not able to reckonect.I am getting punished by losing lp  for a mistake riot made. PLS  riot fix this bug in pacht 9 ,16

Have you tried killing the game and client in task manager then relaunching it? I mean, I agree this is annoying and I was put in elo hell for a couple weeks because I lost LP for the same reason, but in the meantime this is something you can do to get around it and keep climbing.
Yeah i did that, but when i re-open the client there is no Reconnect button lol. just like in the attached pictures. Riots bug managment is an actual joke

Ok. I see them now. Are you absolutely certain you're ending the task in the task manager? Because if you just reopen the client then it's going to think you're still in the game unless that task has been manually terminated.

buddy i wouldn't come here if i haven't tried everything. When i come back after ending the task it just opens the client and gets stuck at ''game in progress'' crap, hopefully they fix it by the next update...

There shouldn't be. It should just take you straight to the loading screen the minute you log back in if you do this. I'd look at the pictures, but the image hosting site is really weird and won't load for me.
